content.html: Discovered by a fried of mine: CVE-2022-26138: A remote, unauthenticated attacker with knowledge of the hardcoded password could exploit this to log into Confluence and access all content accessible to users in the confluence-users group The password is disabled1system1user6708
content.value:
Discovered by a fried of mine:

CVE-2022-26138: A remote, unauthenticated attacker with knowledge of the hardcoded password could exploit this to log into Confluence and access all content accessible to users in the confluence-users group

The password is disabled1system1user6708
